# isOpaque

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the cell is completely opaque.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isOpaque: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the cell is completely opaque or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it contains some transparency.

## Managing Display Attributes

- **isBezeled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell has a bezeled border.
- **isBordered**: A Boolean value indicating whether the cell draws itself outlined with a plain border.
- **controlTint**: The cell’s control tint.
- **backgroundStyle**: The cell’s background style.
- **interiorBackgroundStyle**: The cell’s interior background style.
- **NSView.BackgroundStyle**: Background styles to apply to a view’s cell.
